infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Listergram needs access to your camera to take photos and videos for posts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Listergram needs access to your photo library to share photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Listergram needs access to your microphone to record videos and voice messages.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Listergram uses your location to show nearby events and connect you with people in your tower.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Listergram to access your camera to take photos and videos for posts.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Listergram to access your photos to share them in posts.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Listergram to save photos to your device.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Listergram to use your location to show nearby events and connect you with people in your tower.
